languages.text: {n}Мужчина с достоинством отвечает:{/n} "Всюду, где есть воины Его, должен быть и комиссар, что укрепит их дух и воодушевит сомневающихся. А все мы здесь — Его воины". {n}Он обводит рукой собравшихся людей.{/n}

{n}The man responds proudly,{/n} "Wherever His warriors go, there must be a Commissar to embolden their spirit and inspire the doubtful. And all whom you see here are His warriors." {n}He gestures at the people around you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина с достоинством отвечает:{/n} "Всюду, где есть воины Его, должен быть и комиссар, что укрепит их дух и воодушевит сомневающихся. А все мы здесь — Его воины". {n}Он обводит рукой собравшихся людей.{/n}

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}政委自豪地回应道。{/n}“无论祂的战士们走到哪里，身边都必须有一位政委来鼓舞士气，激励那些心怀疑虑的人们。这里的所有人都是祂的战士。”{n}他朝你周围的人比着手势。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man responds proudly,{/n} "Wherever His warriors go, there must be a Commissar to embolden their spirit and inspire the doubtful. And all whom you see here are His warriors." {n}He gestures at the people around you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}政委自豪地回应道。{/n}“无论祂的战士们走到哪里，身边都必须有一位政委来鼓舞士气，激励那些心怀疑虑的人们。这里的所有人都是祂的战士。”{n}他朝你周围的人比着手势。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}男は誇らしげに答える。{/n}「皇帝の戦士あるところにコミッサーあり。私の努めは皇帝に対して懐疑的な者の精神を奮い立たせ、信じる道へと導くこと。ここにいる者たちもみな、皇帝の戦士です」{n}彼は周囲の人々を指して言った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man responds proudly,{/n} "Wherever His warriors go, there must be a Commissar to embolden their spirit and inspire the doubtful. And all whom you see here are His warriors." {n}He gestures at the people around you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}男は誇らしげに答える。{/n}「皇帝の戦士あるところにコミッサーあり。私の努めは皇帝に対して懐疑的な者の精神を奮い立たせ、信じる道へと導くこと。ここにいる者たちもみな、皇帝の戦士です」{n}彼は周囲の人々を指して言った。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}El hombre responde con orgullo.{/n} «Adonde vayan Sus guerreros, debe haber un Comisario para enardecer sus espíritus e inspirar a los vacilantes. Y todos cuantos estamos aquí somos Sus guerreros». {n}Abarca con un gesto a la gente que os rodea.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man responds proudly,{/n} "Wherever His warriors go, there must be a Commissar to embolden their spirit and inspire the doubtful. And all whom you see here are His warriors." {n}He gestures at the people around you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre responde con orgullo.{/n} «Adonde vayan Sus guerreros, debe haber un Comisario para enardecer sus espíritus e inspirar a los vacilantes. Y todos cuantos estamos aquí somos Sus guerreros». {n}Abarca con un gesto a la gente que os rodea.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The man responds proudly,{/n} "Wherever His warriors go, there must be a Commissar to embolden their spirit and inspire the doubtful. And all whom you see here are His warriors." {n}He gestures at the people around you.{/n}

languages.text: « Partout où vont les soldats de l'Empereur, il doit également y avoir un commissaire pour leur inspirer courage et dissiper leurs doutes, {n}répond-il fièrement.{/n} Et tous ceux que vous voyez ici sont Ses soldats, » {n}ajoute-t-il en désignant les personnes qui se trouvent autour de vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man responds proudly,{/n} "Wherever His warriors go, there must be a Commissar to embolden their spirit and inspire the doubtful. And all whom you see here are His warriors." {n}He gestures at the people around you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Partout où vont les soldats de l'Empereur, il doit également y avoir un commissaire pour leur inspirer courage et dissiper leurs doutes, {n}répond-il fièrement.{/n} Et tous ceux que vous voyez ici sont Ses soldats, » {n}ajoute-t-il en désignant les personnes qui se trouvent autour de vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der Mann antwortet voller Stolz:{/n} "Wo immer Seine Krieger hingehen, dort muss es einen Kommissar geben, der ihren Geist stärkt und die Zweifelnden inspiriert. Und alle, die Ihr hier seht, sind Seine Krieger." {n}Er zeigt auf die Menschen um dich herum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man responds proudly,{/n} "Wherever His warriors go, there must be a Commissar to embolden their spirit and inspire the doubtful. And all whom you see here are His warriors." {n}He gestures at the people around you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann antwortet voller Stolz:{/n} "Wo immer Seine Krieger hingehen, dort muss es einen Kommissar geben, der ihren Geist stärkt und die Zweifelnden inspiriert. Und alle, die Ihr hier seht, sind Seine Krieger." {n}Er zeigt auf die Menschen um dich herum.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Adam gururla cevap veriyor.{/n} "O'nun savaşçıları nereye giderse gitsin, orada ruhlarını güçlendirecek ve şüphe duyanlara inanç aşılayacak bir Komiser olmalıdır. Burada gördükleriniz de O'nun savaşçılarıdır." {n}Etrafındaki insanları gösteriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The man responds proudly,{/n} "Wherever His warriors go, there must be a Commissar to embolden their spirit and inspire the doubtful. And all whom you see here are His warriors." {n}He gestures at the people around you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam gururla cevap veriyor.{/n} "O'nun savaşçıları nereye giderse gitsin, orada ruhlarını güçlendirecek ve şüphelilere ilham verecek bir Komiser olmalıdır. Burada gördükleriniz de O'nun savaşçılarıdır." {n}Etrafındaki insanları gösteriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
